name: Princess’s Luxurious Ball-My Lace Skirt
description:
Princess’s Luxurious Ball is a chic girl makeover game.
The princess is invited to a very interesting party where the theme is couture so princess needs from you a very special couture makeup and of course you wil have to help her choose her outfit too.Have fun!

Game Features:
- Fun-filled beauty makeover fever game
- Help the princess to makeup and help her to choose her favorite clothes
- Well-designed gorgeous cosmetics and skirts as your choice
- Fluent and clearly frames,comfortable color matching
- Simple and funny operations make you easy to play Princess’s Luxurious Ball
